verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं यं यज्ञमध्वरं विश्वतः परिभूरसि। स इद्देवेषु गच्छति॥
verses.transliteration: agniṃ yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi | sa id deveṣu gacchati ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, whom thou encompassest on all sides, that sacrifice of ours goes with the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्मित्रवरुणाश्च सुग्रीवाश्च भरतर्षभाः। हविषा देवानहनि विदधा मे लक्ष्मणः॥
verses.transliteration: agnir mitravaruṇāś ca sugrīvāś ca bharatarṣabhāḥ | haviṣā devān ahani vidadhā me lakṣmaṇaḥ ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, Mitra and Varuṇa, the well-robed bull of Bharata’s race, with oblation on this day uphold the gods for me, O Lakṣmaṇa.

verses.transliteration: agniḥ suparṇo divi savitā vardhamānaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni, with swift wings, like Savitā in heaven, grows strong.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता कविक्रतः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः। देवो देवेभिरा गमत्॥
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikrataḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ | devo devebhir ā gamat ||
verses.translation_english: Agni the Hotar, wise of purpose, true and famed with varied praise — may the God come with the gods.

verses.transliteration: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva divedive | yaśasaṃ vīravattamam ||
verses.translation_english: Through Agni one gains riches and nourishment day by day — most heroic and full of fame.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिर्युते देवेषु चोत्तमः। यशसं वीरवत्तमम्॥
verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir yute deveṣu cottamaḥ | yaśasaṃ vīravattamam ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, joined with ancient seers, foremost among the gods — most glorious and heroic.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने त्वं सुरेशानां दिवो दधाति भूमिप्रजाः।
verses.transliteration: agne tvaṃ sureśānāṃ divo dadhāti bhūmiprajāḥ |
verses.translation_english: O Agni, thou dost uphold the earthly folk from heaven, lord of the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: यं यज्ञमध्वरं शुभ्रं विश्वे देवा अरतयः। प्रसहन्ते तं यथा युज्यन्ते॥
verses.transliteration: yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ śubhraṃ viśve devā aratayaḥ | prasahante taṃ yathā yujyante ||
verses.translation_english: That fair sacrifice which all the gods, even the enemies of order, reach, as they are drawn together.

verses.sanskrit_text: तमहं रममाणो देवधियं मधुवर्तिं यज्ञं गृणामि।
verses.transliteration: tamaham ramamāṇo devadhiyaṃ madhuvartiṃ yajñaṃ gṛṇāmi |
verses.translation_english: Rejoicing in divine thought, I praise this sacrifice, sweetly flowing.

verses.sanskrit_text: एष अग्निः प्रचण्डः प्र चेतसो दधाति हितं नो वयुनः।
verses.transliteration: eṣa agniḥ pracaṇḍaḥ pra cetaso dadhāti hitaṃ no vayunaḥ |
verses.translation_english: This Agni, mighty in thought, bestows our welfare.

verses.sanskrit_text: एष अग्निः सुवर्त्तिं दधाति विश्वाय विश्वाभिः सम्भृत्या कल्पयन्।
verses.transliteration: eṣa agniḥ suvarṭtiṃ dadhāti viśvāya viśvābhiḥ sambhṛtyā kalpayan |
verses.translation_english: This Agni establishes good order for all, fashioning by his universal might.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रो न वरुणो न अर्यमा न इन्द्रो बृहस्पतिः।
verses.transliteration: sa no mitro na varuṇo na aryamā na indro bṛhaspatiḥ |
verses.translation_english: May Mitra be kind to us, may Varuṇa, may Aryaman, and Indra, and Brihaspati.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो देवा ऋतवः सन्तु विश्वे ऋतवस्ति नः सह।
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no devā ṛtavaḥ santu viśve ṛtavas ti naḥ saha |
verses.translation_english: May all the gods, guardians of cosmic order, be with us.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने सोममनु यजते तस्य शुभं करिष्यति।
verses.transliteration: agne somamanu yajate tasya śubhaṃ kariṣyati |
verses.translation_english: Whoso worships Agni in union with Soma, that worshipper shall prosper.

verses.sanskrit_text: यदैन्द्राय सोमपाय नो दधाति वयसा वरम्।
verses.transliteration: yad indrāya somapāya no dadhāti vayasa varam |
verses.translation_english: When he gives Soma to Indra for our delight.

verses.sanskrit_text: शतक्रतो वाजिनः सह सदा यज्ञा अव विभाति।
verses.transliteration: śatakrato vājinah saha sadā yajñā ava vibhāti |
verses.translation_english: Ever the hundred‑minded, the energetic, the sacrifice shines forth.

verses.sanskrit_text: यं देवा आमन्तरि क्षन्तो मनीषिणः परिशुष्कृतमिव।
verses.transliteration: yaṃ devā āmantari kṣanto manīṣīṇaḥ pariśuṣkṛtam iva |
verses.translation_english: That which the thoughtful among men have distilled within their minds.

verses.transliteration: agne taṃ vardhaya devi śobhāmānam |
verses.translation_english: O Agni, increase that which is resplendent.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्न्या ते वाचं देवानां सुपथं दधामा।
verses.transliteration: agnyā te vācaṃ devānāṃ supathaṃ dadhāmā |
verses.translation_english: By Agni let your word be firmly placed on the good path of the gods.

verses.transliteration: tasmai agnaye hiraṇyagnaye ca namaḥ |
verses.translation_english: To Agni, to the golden Agni, be homage.

verses.sanskrit_text: तस्मै ताव देवानां पित्रो महो वाव देवेभिरभि॒धातु॒।
verses.transliteration: tasmai tāva devānāṃ pitro maho vāva devebhir abhi dhātu |
verses.translation_english: To him may the hosts of gods and mighty fathers affix (our worship).

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं सुवर्ग्निं सुवे धर्मश्चिरं धिया दधामहे।
verses.transliteration: agniṃ suvargniṃ suve dharmaś ciraṃ dhiyā dadhāmahe |
verses.translation_english: We invoke Agni who brings good fortune and uphold the enduring law.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो मित्रो वरुणो विद्वांसो नो भवतु यशसा प्रथमानि॥
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no mitro varuṇo vidvāṃso no bhavatu yaśasā prathamāni ||
verses.translation_english: May Mitra and Varuṇa be auspicious to us; may the wise be foremost in glory.

verses.transliteration: agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
verses.translation_english: O Agni, thou encompassest the sacrifice on all sides.

verses.transliteration: sa id deveṣu gacchati yathātathā ’psavaḥ prajāḥ |
verses.translation_english: That sacrifice of ours goes with the gods, like herds of kine.

verses.transliteration: agnir mitravaruṇāś ca sugrīvāś ca bharatarṣabhāḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni, Mitra and Varuṇa, the well‑girdled heroes of the Bharata race.

verses.transliteration: haviṣā devān ahani vidadhā me lakṣmaṇaḥ |
verses.translation_english: With oblations, uphold the gods for me, O Lakṣmaṇa.

verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikrataḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni the Hotar of true and varied praise — may he come with the gods.

verses.transliteration: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva divedive |
verses.translation_english: Through Agni one attains wealth and nourishment day by day.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रो वरुणो विद्वांसो नो भवतु यशसा प्रथमानि।
verses.transliteration: sa no mitro varuṇo vidvāṃso no bhavatu yaśasā prathamāni |

verses.transliteration: śaṃ no devā ṛtavaḥ santu viśve ṛtavas ti naḥ saha |
verses.translation_english: May all the gods, guardians of cosmic order, be with us.

verses.transliteration: agne tvā devayajyayā haviṣā vidhema |
verses.translation_english: O Agni, with divine worship and oblation let us laud thee.

verses.transliteration: tasmai agnaye hiraṇyagnaye ca namaḥ |
verses.translation_english: To Agni, to the golden Agni, be homage.

verses.transliteration: agniṃ yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
verses.translation_english: O Agni, thou encompassest the sacrifice on all sides.

verses.transliteration: sa id deveṣu gacchati yathātathā ’psavaḥ prajāḥ |
verses.translation_english: That sacrifice of ours goes with the gods, like herds of kine.

verses.transliteration: agnir mitravaruṇāś ca sugrīvāś ca bharatarṣabhāḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni, Mitra and Varuṇa, the well‑girdled heroes of the Bharata race.

verses.transliteration: haviṣā devān ahani vidadhā me lakṣmaṇaḥ |
verses.translation_english: With oblations, uphold the gods for me, O Lakṣmaṇa.

verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikrataḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni the Hotar of true and varied praise — may he come with the gods.

verses.transliteration: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva divedive |
verses.translation_english: Through Agni one attains wealth and nourishment day by day.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रो वरुणो विद्वांसो नो भवतु यशसा प्रथमानि।
verses.transliteration: sa no mitro varuṇo vidvāṃso no bhavatu yaśasā prathamāni |
verses.translation_english: May Mitra and Varuṇa be auspicious to us; may the wise be foremost in glory.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो देवा ऋतवः सन्तु विश्वे ऋतवस्ति नः सह।
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no devā ṛtavaḥ santu viśve ṛtavas ti naḥ saha |
verses.translation_english: May all the gods, guardians of cosmic order, be with us.

verses.transliteration: agne tvā devayajyayā haviṣā vidhema |
verses.translation_english: O Agni, with divine worship and oblation let us laud thee.

verses.transliteration: tasmai agnaye hiraṇyagnaye ca namaḥ |
verses.translation_english: To Agni, to the golden Agni, be homage.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने तव यज्ञं विधेहि नो वरम्।
verses.transliteration: agne tava yajñaṃ vidhehi no varam |
verses.translation_english: O Agni, direct this sacrifice for our welfare.

verses.transliteration: agniṃ vo devam agnibhiḥ saparyanto namasyata
verses.translation_english: Honor Agni the god with reverence and offerings.

verses.sanskrit_text: यो नः पितेव सूनवेऽग्ने सूपायनो भव।
verses.transliteration: yo naḥ piteva sūnave agne sūpāyano bhava
verses.translation_english: As a father to his son, O Agni, be easy of approach to us.

verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni the priest, wise in counsel, true and most renowned.

verses.transliteration: agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi
verses.translation_english: O Agni, thou encompassest the sacrifice on every side.

verses.transliteration: sa id deveṣu gacchati yathā tathā apsavaḥ
verses.translation_english: That sacrifice goes to the gods as streams flow to the ocean.

verses.transliteration: agne tvaṃ no antamaḥ svastibhir devavītaye
verses.translation_english: O Agni, bring us near to the gods with blessings.

verses.transliteration: agnir viśvāni vāryā dadhāti rayim aśnavat
verses.translation_english: Agni bestows all desirable treasures and wealth.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने मित्रमहः सखा वरुणस्य च राजसः।
verses.transliteration: agne mitramahaḥ sakhā varuṇasya ca rājasaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni, friend of Mitra and of king Varuṇa.

verses.transliteration: tvam agne dyubhir nṛbhiḥ sakhā sakhye samiddhyase
verses.translation_english: O Agni, with men and days thou art kindled as a friend.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने यज्ञं न आ वह देवानां यजमानम्।
verses.transliteration: agne yajñaṃ na ā vaha devānāṃ yajamānam
verses.translation_english: O Agni, bring the gods to our sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने शर्धो मरुतां न वृष्ण्यं हविष्मन्तो नमस्यामि त्वा।
verses.transliteration: agne śardho marutāṃ na vṛṣṇyaṃ haviṣmanto namasyāmi tvā
verses.translation_english: O Agni, like the strong host of the Maruts, we worship thee with offerings.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं हि विश्वतोमुखो देवाँ एषि यज्ञियः।
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi viśvatomukho devāṃ eṣi yajñiyaḥ
verses.translation_english: For thou, facing all directions, goest to the gods worthy of sacrifice.

verses.transliteration: tvam agne vasur viśvaṃ dadhāsi rayim aśnavat
verses.translation_english: O Agni, thou bestowest all wealth and prosperity.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं नो मित्रो भवसि त्वं वरुण उत।
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ no mitro bhavasi tvaṃ varuṇa uta
verses.translation_english: Thou art for us as Mitra; thou art also as Varuṇa.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वमिन्द्रो असि द्रविणोदा उत त्वं बृहस्पतिः।
verses.transliteration: tvam indro asi draviṇodā uta tvaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ
verses.translation_english: Thou art Indra, the giver of wealth; thou art Bṛhaspati.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वमग्ने विश्वतो रक्षो दह प्रत्नेन मन्युना।
verses.transliteration: tvam agne viśvato rakṣo daha pratnena manyunā
verses.translation_english: O Agni, burn away all hostile powers with ancient might.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पाथो अनुत्तमं स्वस्तिभिः पावक दीदिहि।
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ pātho anuttamaṃ svastibhiḥ pāvaka dīdihi
verses.translation_english: Shine for us, O purifier, with supreme blessings.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं हि देवाँ अवोचो यज्ञियान् हविष्मतः।
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi devāṃ avocho yajñiyān haviṣmataḥ
verses.translation_english: For thou callest the gods to the worshipper with offerings.

verses.transliteration: agne vayaṃ tava śaraṇaṃ gamema
verses.translation_english: O Agni, may we come into thy protection.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने यज्ञं न आ वह देवाँ इह वक्षि।
verses.transliteration: agne yajñaṃ na ā vaha devāṃ iha vakṣi
verses.translation_english: O Agni, bring the gods hither to our sacrifice.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi ratnaṃ bahudhā dadhāsi
verses.translation_english: Thou indeed bestowest treasures manifold.

verses.transliteration: tvam agne dīdivāṃsam upa brūhi
verses.translation_english: O shining Agni, proclaim us to the gods.

verses.transliteration: agne sakhā no adhvare
verses.translation_english: O Agni, be our friend in the sacrifice.

verses.transliteration: agne yajñasya hotāraṃ viśvavedasam
verses.translation_english: O Agni, knower of all, the Hotar of the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नः पावक दीदिहि विश्वानि देव्यावः।
verses.transliteration: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdihi viśvāni devy āvaḥ
verses.translation_english: Shine upon us, O purifier, with all divine protections.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi ratnadhā asi
verses.translation_english: For thou art the bestower of treasures.

verses.transliteration: tvam agne viśvato rakṣo daha
verses.translation_english: O Agni, burn away every foe on all sides.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ piteva sūnave
verses.translation_english: Be to us as a father to his son.

verses.transliteration: agne devān iha vakṣi
verses.translation_english: O Agni, bring the gods here.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi viśvatomukhaḥ
verses.translation_english: For thou art facing in every direction.

verses.transliteration: agne sakhā no bhava
verses.translation_english: O Agni, be our friend.

verses.transliteration: agne yajñaṃ na ā vaha
verses.translation_english: O Agni, bring the sacrifice to fulfillment.

verses.transliteration: agniṃ vo devam agnibhiḥ saparyanto namasyata
verses.translation_english: Worship Agni, the god, with reverence and offerings.

verses.transliteration: sa hi kṣapāvān divo rocaneṣu
verses.translation_english: He shines through the nights in the realms of heaven.

verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni, the priest, wise in counsel, most glorious in fame.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं हि विश्वतोमुखो देवाँ एषि यज्ञियः।
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi viśvatomukho devāṃ eṣi yajñiyaḥ
verses.translation_english: For thou, facing all directions, goest to the gods.

verses.transliteration: tvam agne vasur viśvaṃ dadhāsi rayim aśnavat
verses.translation_english: O Agni, thou bestowest wealth and prosperity.

verses.transliteration: agne sakhā no adhvare
verses.translation_english: O Agni, be our friend in the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने यज्ञं न आ वह देवान् इह वक्षि।
verses.transliteration: agne yajñaṃ na ā vaha devān iha vakṣi
verses.translation_english: O Agni, bring the gods here to our rite.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पितेव सूनवेऽग्ने सूपायनो भव।
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ piteva sūnave agne sūpāyano bhava
verses.translation_english: As a father to his son, O Agni, be easy of access to us.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi ratnadhā asi
verses.translation_english: Thou art the giver of treasures.

verses.transliteration: agne viśvāni vāryā dadhāti
verses.translation_english: Agni bestows all desirable things.

verses.transliteration: agne śaṃ no bhava dviṣatām
verses.translation_english: O Agni, grant us peace against our foes.

verses.transliteration: agniṃ vo devayajyayā haviṣmantaḥ samiddhatam
verses.translation_english: Kindle Agni with sacred worship and offerings.

verses.transliteration: sa no mitro varuṇo mamattu
verses.translation_english: May Mitra and Varuṇa rejoice in us.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने त्वं नो अन्तमः स्वस्तिभिः पावक दीदिहि।
verses.transliteration: agne tvaṃ no antamaḥ svastibhiḥ pāvaka dīdihi
verses.translation_english: O Agni, shine for us with blessings and protection.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं हि विश्वतोमुखो देवाँ एषि यज्ञियः।
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi viśvatomukho devāṃ eṣi yajñiyaḥ
verses.translation_english: For thou, facing all directions, goest to the gods.

verses.transliteration: agne sakhā no bhava
verses.translation_english: O Agni, be our friend.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने यज्ञं न आ वह देवान् इह वक्षि।
verses.transliteration: agne yajñaṃ na ā vaha devān iha vakṣi
verses.translation_english: O Agni, bring the gods here to our rite.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं हि रत्नधा असि विश्वानि वार्या दधासि।
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi ratnadhā asi viśvāni vāryā dadhāsi
verses.translation_english: Thou art the giver of treasures and all desirable riches.

verses.transliteration: agne śaṃ no bhava dviṣatām
verses.translation_english: O Agni, grant us peace against our adversaries.

verses.translation_english: O Agni, may we come into thy protection.
